item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Stephen King to Shut Down His 3 Radio Stations in Maine (16 points | 4 comments)
2. The Tube Computer (37 points | 12 comments)
3. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (100 points | 184 comments)
4. Skia Canvas: Browser-Less Implementation of the HTML Canvas Drawing API for Node (81 points | 42 comments)
5. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D Engine (141 points | 32 comments)
6. My Brand New Digitizing Workflow Using a 25 Year Old Film Scanner (26 points | 13 comments)
7. Amazon Nova (108 points | 29 comments)
8. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (61 points | 100 comments)
9. Webhooks Are Harder Than They Seem (9 points | discuss)
10. ‘With brain preservation, nobody has to die’ (36 points | 110 comments)
11. TOC MyTimeMachine: Personalized Facial Age Transformation (15 points | 2 comments)
12. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (28 points | 16 comments)
13. Stack Auth (YC S24), open-source Auth0 alternative, is hiring Founding SWEs ( | hide)
14. We switched from Next.js to Astro (and why it might interest you) (93 points | 60 comments)
15. On-scalp printing of personalized electroencephalography e-tattoos (24 points | discuss)
16. Lessons I learned working at an art gallery (383 points | 154 comments)
17. USC Student Rocket Group Shatters International Amateur Space Record (207 points | 185 comments)
18. South Korean president declares martial law, parliament votes to lift it (466 points | 503 comments)
19. The Curse of Markdown (50 points | 53 comments)
20. Amazon Aurora DSQL (84 points | 53 comments)
21. 'I'm running a Mud so I can learn C programming ' (1993) (79 points | 62 comments)
22. Ask HN: Payment processing for micro SaaS outside USA? (35 points | 31 comments)
23. MTA's A.I. bus cameras issue mistaken parking violations (35 points | 30 comments)
24. AI poetry is indistinguishable from human poetry and is rated more favorably (34 points | 72 comments)
25. Rust in QEMU Roadmap (201 points | 102 comments)
26. FTC Bans Location Data Company That Powers the Surveillance Ecosystem (36 points | 15 comments)
27. Vintage digicams aren't just a fad. They're an artistic statement (79 points | 159 comments)
28. Rewrite Git history via drag-and-drop (50 points | 74 comments)
29. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (December 2024) (350 points | 334 comments)
30. Show HN: My party game where AI decides if you’re funny (69 points | 39 comments)
